CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( License_Registration_Type__c , 'Entertainment Work') && ISPICKVAL(Registration_Duration__c , '6 Months - Permit') , Legal_Entity_Name__c & " " & TEXT(License_Registration_Type__c)& " " & Application_Type__c & " " & "application received" , Legal_Entity_Name__c & " " & TEXT(License_Registration_Type__c)& " " & Application_Type__c & " - Ready for Payment" )
CustomField.label: Reg Submit Email Alert Subject
